column2: Derived from 1st Amendment. Ensures public/press access to criminal trials (*Richmond Newspapers*).
Supreme Court ruled there is NO general 'reporter's privilege' to refuse to testify before a grand jury.
Supreme Court ruled 4th Amendment does NOT protect newsrooms from valid search warrants.
Overruled *Zurcher*. Prohibits seizing public dissemination materials via search warrant (must use subpoena).
Materials created by the journalist (notes, drafts) in anticipation of communication to public.
Materials obtained from others on which information is formally recorded (photos, tapes).
